type.description: Property. It must be equal to `BatteryCell`.

dateManufactured.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/DateTime'. The date of manufacture

dateInstalled.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/DateTime'. The date installed to battery pack or Device

energyExtracted.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units:'kilowatt hour (kWh)'. Total energy extracted i.e. consumed since metering started (since `dateInstalled`).

energyCharged.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units:'kilowatt hour (kWh)'. Total energy charged to the battery cell since metering started (since `dateInstalled`).

voltage.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units:'volt (V)'. Cell voltage at the moment of `observedAt` time

current.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units:'ampere (A)'. Discharge(negative)/charge(positive) at the moment of `observedAt` time

currentCapacity.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units:'ampere-hour (Ah)'. Total energy imported i.e. consumed (with regards to apparent power) since the metering start date (`dateEnergyMeteringStarted`)

originalCapacity.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units:'kilovolt-ampere-hour (Ah)'. Total energy imported i.e. consumed (with regards to apparent power) since the metering start date (`dateEnergyMeteringStarted`)

resistance.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units:'ohm (Ohm)'. Cell internal resistance at the moment of `observedAt` time

remainingCapacity.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units:'percentage (%)'. State-of-heath of the battery cell

remainingCharge.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units:'percentage (%)'. Total energy exported since metering started (since `dateEnergyMeteringStarted`).
